addr: 110 Fifth Avenue. Fifth Floor . New York, New York  10011
title: Authenticity in Advertising: Buzzword or Real Deal?
desc:
Everyone is talking about it but what does authenticity in advertising mean for consumers, advertisers, brands and content creators? Does being authentic mean talking with an honest, relatable brand voice and/or does authentic mean creative that hasn't been highly produced, that appears more real? Or both?? 
 This panel will explore what the authenticity movement is, ?what trends are driving ?it and what role platforms like YouTube, Instagram, 500px and Vine play. We'll hash out if and how authenticity impacts creative and content and whether user-generated content such as photos and videos have a role in? tomorrow's ?advertising campaigns.? 
 Join us for an evening of drinks, great food and a fantastic panel discussion.? 
 Moderator: Tanya Dua, Brand Reporter, Digiday 
 Panelists include:   - Raashi Bhalla , Creative Strategist, Pinterest - Sherine Kazim, Executive Creative Director,  Huge -Laura Edwards, Director Planning and Projects, Adidas  -Izzy DeBellis, Group Chief Creative & Strategy Officer, Naked -Tony Lederer, Senior Strategiest, Grey Advertising  -Nuno Silva, Director of Content, 500px 
 Happy Hour begins at  6pm . The panel discussion will begin just after 7pm and be followed by a Q&A session.? 
 Tag your tweets and pics with  #AuthenticNYC  to share your experience . We look forward to meeting you!
